basics.name: Clayton Burlison
basics.label: Mac Administrator
basics.summary: This is a summary...I'm gonna fill this with information at some point in the future.

work.position: CTE Technology Support Specialist and Apple Administrator
work.summary: Managed Apple clients using the following tools: Munki, MunkiReport, Reposado, AutoPkg, AutoDMG, DeployStudio, Docker, and more. Created technical guides and documented changes for managing our Apple fleet of computers. Created packages, wrote shell scripts, and implemented our management system for Apple clients using Open Source products. Provided support for the Career and Technology Education Department while working closely with Birdville's Technology Department.

Assisted with teaching in the Audio Video Production department at Birdville ISD, included: editing videos, helping students with AV equipment, troubleshooted application errors, and recording district events. Help support with live Audio/Video needs within the building. In charge of updating the live signage including the a local cable channel (Ch. 192) throughout the district with the usage of Ciscoâ€™s Media Manager System.
